name: CloudCruise
headline: An API to trigger workflows in the browser
description: CloudCruise lets you trigger user-permissioned workflows in any SaaS software. We do this by providing a simple and well-documented development environment, as well as authentication and browser infrastructure.

Automate any browser-based knowledge work, from basic actions to complex logic.
Record a video, send it to us and get a workflow API within two business days.

### Call our API, we'll do the rest
Integrate with CloudCruise just like a normal API. 
CloudCruise automatically runs your workflow in a virtual Chrome browser, and handles common concerns like bot detection, secure user authentication and maintenance.
```
curl -X POST https://api.cloudcruise.com/run \
   -H "cc-key: <apiKey>" \
   -d '{
      "workflow_id": "register_employee",
      "run_input_variables": {...}
     }'
```

FirstName
LastName
Dob

Suggested Fix
### Optimize for reliability
CloudCruise was designed to do knowledge work quickly and reliably - much in contrast to OpenAI's Operator. We formulate work automation as a code generation and maintenance problem, instead of a multi-step reasoning problem at runtime.
Always stay in the loop with workflow screenshots, recordings and status updates, which are available over both the API and dashboard.

### Optimize for reliability
CloudCruise was designed to do knowledge work quickly and reliably - much in contrast to OpenAI's Operator. We formulate work automation as a code generation and maintenance problem, instead of a multi-step reasoning problem at runtime.
Always stay in the loop with workflow screenshots, recordings and status updates, which are available over both the API and dashboard.

### Avoid bot detection
CloudCruise runs workflows in a stealth environment that's as human as possible so that you don't need to worry about bot detection anymore.
### Avoid bot detection
CloudCruise runs workflows in a stealth environment that's as human as possible so that you don't need to worry about bot detection anymore.
## Automate anything on the web
### Automate anything on the web
### Health
Navigating insurance portals and EHR systems is complex and time-consuming. CloudCruise provides APIs to verify insurance and check claim status across major payor web portals (including Availity, UHC, and Cigna). With secure read/write integrations for leading EHR platforms and full HIPAA compliance, CloudCruise helps healthcare companies take actions in more software while maintaining regulatory standards.
Integrate with payors
Data entry to EHR systems
RCM operations
[View Project](https://cloudcruise.com/<./>)

### Scheduling
Our APIs seamlessly integrate with leading scheduling systems, enabling front-office AI companies to handle real-time availability, appointment booking, and reservation management. From restaurants and hotels to maintenance services, CloudCruise enables customer scheduling workflows across any web platform.
Get availability
Schedule new appointments
Manage reservations

### Call our API, we'll do the rest
Integrate with CloudCruise just like a normal API. 
CloudCruise automatically runs your workflow in a virtual Chrome browser, and handles common concerns like bot detection, secure user authentication and maintenance.
```
curl -X POST https://api.cloudcruise.com/run \
   -H "cc-key: <apiKey>" \
   -d '{
      "workflow_id": "register_employee",
      "run_input_variables": {...}
     }'
```

Suggested Fix
### Optimize for reliability
CloudCruise was designed to do knowledge work quickly and reliably - much in contrast to OpenAI's Operator. We formulate work automation as a code generation and maintenance problem, instead of a multi-step reasoning problem at runtime.
Always stay in the loop with workflow screenshots, recordings and status updates, which are available over both the API and dashboard.

### Optimize for reliability
CloudCruise was designed to do knowledge work quickly and reliably - much in contrast to OpenAI's Operator. We formulate work automation as a code generation and maintenance problem, instead of a multi-step reasoning problem at runtime.
Always stay in the loop with workflow screenshots, recordings and status updates, which are available over both the API and dashboard.

## Automate anything on the web
### Automate anything on the web
### Health
Navigating insurance portals and EHR systems is complex and time-consuming. CloudCruise provides APIs to verify insurance and check claim status across major payor web portals (including Availity, UHC, and Cigna). With secure read/write integrations for leading EHR platforms and full HIPAA compliance, CloudCruise helps healthcare companies take actions in more software while maintaining regulatory standards.
Integrate with payors
Data entry to EHR systems
RCM operations

generated_description:
**CloudCruise: Simplifying Automation in the Digital Age**

Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, CloudCruise is a promising startup from the Y Combinator Batch W24. Their mission? To provide an API that allows users to trigger workflows in any browser-based software, making automation effortless and efficient.

At its core, CloudCruise is designed to let users navigate complex SaaS applications without the headaches typically associated with workflow automation. They focus on enabling *user-permissioned workflows*, meaning you can execute actions with the right permissions in any web app—think clicking buttons, filling forms, and extracting information seamlessly.

With a lean team of three, CloudCruise aims to deliver a well-documented development environment coupled with robust authentication and browser infrastructure. This setup not only simplifies integrating their solutions into existing systems but also ensures reliability and speed. They've built their platform to be faster and more dependable than many of the existing solutions on the market today, even positioning themselves as "more reliable and faster than OpenAI’s Operator."

### Key Features

1. **User-Centric Workflow Automation**: Automate tasks that require user actions and permissions across various SaaS platforms. The idea is simple: make automation easy without compromising compliance and security.
   
2. **Developer-Friendly Documentation**: With a focus on offering a smooth developer experience, CloudCruise provides rigorous documentation, so integrating their API into applications is straightforward.

3. **Stealth Environment for Bot Detection**: CloudCruise's system navigates typical bot detection hurdles with an approach that mimics human behavior, ensuring your automated tasks run without interference.

4. **Self-Healing Automation**: Their automation system doesn't require constant user maintenance, aiming instead for a hands-off approach that significantly reduces the workload associated with bot management.

5. **Rich Integrations**: Whether it's healthcare, finance, or e-commerce, CloudCruise's APIs can connect with various industry platforms, streamlining operations from processing insurance claims to managing online orders.

### Current Offerings

CloudCruise is gaining traction with users who require quick, reliable automations across different software tools, particularly in high-complexity environments like insurance and e-commerce. Their service allows users to set up workflows by simply recording their actions in a browser, translating them into API calls that can be executed with a curl command or integrated directly into applications.

### Join the Revolution

If you’re keen to explore what CloudCruise can do, you can [check out their website](https://cloudcruise.com) for more details, and even book a demo to see the product in action. 

CloudCruise is not just another automation tool; it’s a future-oriented solution aiming to redefine how businesses approach workflow management in a connected, digital-first world. As they continue to grow, it will be exciting to see how they shape the landscape of web automation and workflow efficiency.
